verses.verse: Then Eliashib<WH475> the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> arose<WH6965> with his brothers<WH251> the priests<WH3548> and built<WH1129> the Sheep<WH6629> Gate;<WH8179> they consecrated<WH6942> it and hung<WH5975> its doors.<WH1817> They consecrated<WH6942> the wall to the Tower<WH4026> of the Hundred<WH3968> [and] the Tower<WH4026> of Hananel.<WH2606>
And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him the men<WH376> of Jericho<WH3405> built,<WH1129> and next<WH5921> <WH3027> to them Zaccur<WH2139> the son<WH1121> of Imri<WH566> built.<WH1129>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Hassenaah<WH5570> built<WH1129> the Fish<WH1709> Gate;<WH8179> they laid<WH9529> its beams<WH9529> and hung<WH5975> its doors<WH1817> with its bolts<WH4514> and bars.<WH1280>

And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to them Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the son<WH1121> of Hakkoz<WH6976> made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388> And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Meshezabel<WH4898> made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388> And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Zadok<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Baana<WH1195> also made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388>
Moreover, next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him the Tekoites<WH8621> made<WH2388> repairs,<WH2388> but their nobles<WH117> did not support<WH935> <WH6677> the work<WH5656> of their masters.<WH113>

And Joiada<WH3077> the son<WH1121> of Paseah<WH6454> and Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Besodeiah<WH1152> repaired<WH2388> the Old<WH3465> Gate;<WH8179> they laid<WH9529> its beams<WH9529> and hung<WH5975> its doors,<WH1817> with its bolts<WH4514> and its bars.<WH1280>

Next<WH5921> <WH3027> to them Melatiah<WH4424> the Gibeonite<WH1393> and Jadon<WH3036> the Meronothite,<WH4824> the men<WH376> of Gibeon<WH1391> and of Mizpah,<WH4709> also made<WH2388> repairs<WH2388> for the official<WH3678> seat<WH3678> of the governor<WH6346> [of the province] beyond<WH5676> the River.<WH5104>

Next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Uzziel<WH5816> the son<WH1121> of Harhaiah<WH9170> of the goldsmiths<WH6884> made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388> And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Hananiah,<WH2608> one<WH1121> of the perfumers,<WH7546> made<WH2388> repairs,<WH2388> and they restored<WH9395> Jerusalem<WH3389> as far<WH5704> as the Broad<WH7342> Wall.<WH2346>
And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to them Rephaiah<WH7509> the son<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> the official<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388>

Next<WH5921> <WH3027> to them Jedaiah<WH3042> the son<WH1121> of Harumaph<WH2739> made<WH2388> repairs<WH2388> opposite<WH5048> his house.<WH1004> And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Hattush<WH2407> the son<WH1121> of Hashabneiah<WH2813> made<WH2388> repairs.<WH2388>
Malchijah<WH4441> the son<WH1121> of Harim<WH2766> and Hasshub<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Pahath-moab repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section<WH4060> and the Tower<WH4026> of Furnaces.<WH8574>

And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Hallohesh,<WH3873> the official<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> made<WH2388> repairs,<WH2388> he and his daughters.<WH1323>

Hanun<WH2586> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Zanoah<WH2182> repaired<WH2388> the Valley<WH1516> Gate.<WH8179> They built<WH1129> it and hung<WH5975> its doors<WH1817> with its bolts<WH4514> and its bars,<WH1280> and a thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520> of the wall<WH2346> to the Refuse<WH830> Gate.<WH8179>

And Malchijah<WH4441> the son<WH1121> of Rechab,<WH7394> the official<WH8269> of the district<WH6418> of Beth-haccherem repaired<WH2388> the Refuse<WH830> Gate.<WH8179> He built<WH1129> it and hung<WH5975> its doors<WH1817> with its bolts<WH4514> and its bars.<WH1280>

Shallum<WH7968> the son<WH1121> of Col-hozeh, the official<WH8269> of the district<WH6418> of Mizpah,<WH4709> repaired<WH2388> the Fountain<WH9407> Gate.<WH8179> He built<WH1129> it, covered<WH2926> it, and hung<WH5975> its doors<WH1817> with its bolts<WH4514> and its bars,<WH1280> and the wall<WH2346> of the Pool<WH1295> of Shelah<WH9604> at the king's garden<WH1588> as far<WH5704> as the steps<WH4609> that descend<WH3381> from the city<WH5892> of David.<WH1732>

After<WH310> him Nehemiah<WH5166> the son<WH1121> of Azbuk,<WH5802> official<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Beth-zur, made<WH2388> repairs<WH2388> as far<WH5704> as [a point] opposite<WH5048> the tombs<WH6913> of David,<WH1732> and as far<WH5704> as the artificial<WH6213> pool<WH1295> and the house<WH1004> of the mighty<WH1368> men.<WH1368>

After<WH310> him the Levites<WH3881> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> [under] Rehum<WH7348> the son<WH1121> of Bani.<WH1137> Next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Hashabiah,<WH2811> the official<WH8269> of half<WH2677> the district<WH6418> of Keilah,<WH7084> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> for his district.<WH6418>

After<WH310> him their brothers<WH251> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> [under] Bavvai<WH942> the son<WH1121> of Henadad,<WH2582> official<WH8269> of [the other] half<WH2677> of the district<WH6418> of Keilah.<WH7084>

And next<WH5921> <WH3027> to him Ezer<WH5829> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua,<WH3091> the official<WH8269> of Mizpah,<WH4709> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section,<WH4060> in front<WH5048> of the ascent<WH5927> of the armory<WH5402> at the Angle.<WH4740>

After<WH310> him Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Zabbai<WH2079> zealously<WH2734> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section,<WH4060> from the Angle<WH4740> to the doorway<WH6607> of the house<WH1004> of Eliashib<WH475> the high<WH1419> priest.<WH3548>

After<WH310> him Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the son<WH1121> of Hakkoz<WH6976> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section,<WH4060> from the doorway<WH6607> of Eliashib's house<WH1004> even as far<WH5704> as the end<WH8503> of his house.<WH1004>
And after<WH310> him the priests,<WH3548> the men<WH376> of the valley,<WH3603> carried<WH2388> out repairs.<WH2388>

After<WH310> them Benjamin<WH1144> and Hasshub<WH2815> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> in front<WH5048> of their house.<WH1004> After<WH310> them Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah,<WH4641> son<WH1121> of Ananiah<WH6055> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> beside<WH681> his house.<WH1004>

After<WH310> him Binnui<WH1131> the son<WH1121> of Henadad<WH2582> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section,<WH4060> from the house<WH1004> of Azariah<WH5838> as far<WH5704> as the Angle<WH4740> and as far<WH5704> as the corner.<WH6438>

Palal<WH6420> the son<WH1121> of Uzai<WH186> [made repairs] in front<WH5048> of the Angle<WH4740> and the tower<WH4026> projecting<WH3318> from the upper<WH5945> house<WH1004> of the king,<WH4428> which<WH834> is by the court<WH2691> of the guard.<WH4307> After<WH310> him Pedaiah<WH6305> the son<WH1121> of Parosh<WH6551> [made repairs.]

And the temple<WH5411> servants<WH5411> living<WH3427> in Ophel<WH6077> [made repairs] as far<WH5704> as the front<WH5048> of the Water<WH4325> Gate<WH8179> toward the east<WH4217> and the projecting<WH3318> tower.<WH4026>

After<WH310> him the Tekoites<WH8621> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section<WH4060> in front<WH5048> of the great<WH1419> projecting<WH3318> tower<WH4026> and as far<WH5704> as the wall<WH2346> of Ophel.<WH6077>
Above<WH4480> <WH5921> the Horse<WH5483> Gate<WH8179> the priests<WH3548> carried<WH2388> out repairs,<WH2388> each<WH376> in front<WH5048> of his house.<WH1004>

After<WH310> them Zadok<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Immer<WH564> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> in front<WH5048> of his house.<WH1004> And after<WH310> him Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Shecaniah,<WH7935> the keeper<WH8104> of the East<WH4217> Gate,<WH8179> carried<WH2388> out repairs.<WH2388>

After<WH310> him Hananiah<WH2608> the son<WH1121> of Shelemiah,<WH8018> and Hanun<WH2586> the sixth<WH8345> son<WH1121> of Zalaph,<WH6764> repaired<WH2388> another<WH8145> section.<WH4060> After<WH310> him Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah<WH1296> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> in front<WH5048> of his own quarters.<WH5393>

After<WH310> him Malchijah<WH4441> one<WH1121> of the goldsmiths,<WH6885> carried<WH2388> out repairs<WH2388> as far<WH5704> as the house<WH1004> of the temple<WH5411> servants<WH5411> and of the merchants,<WH7402> in front<WH5048> of the Inspection<WH4663> Gate<WH8179> and as far<WH5704> as the upper<WH5944> room<WH5944> of the corner.<WH6438>
And between<WH996> the upper<WH5944> room<WH5944> of the corner<WH6438> and the Sheep<WH6629> Gate<WH8179> the goldsmiths<WH6884> and the merchants<WH7402> carried<WH2388> out repairs.<WH2388>
